resources.string: In this application we provide our best estimate based on the best information available to us, even when that evidence is not entirely conclusive or accurate. We have read a lot of research written by experts, however we ourselves are not experts on this topic. There is still a lot of uncertainty about COVID-19 and the ways that it is being dealt with are rapidly changing. Do not rely on this tool for any medical advice. Please continue to follow government guidance. Please use this application at your own risk!
How many people will be near(within 15 feet) you?
This is riskPercentage risky for you.
*1 microCOVID = a one-in-a-million chance of getting COVID.
What is the person(s) Risk Profile?
What types of activities will be performed?
How close are the nearby people, on average?
How long is the activity, in minutes?

string-array.name: riskProfiles
string-array.item: An average person in your area
An essential or front-line worker in your area
Someone in your area that is not an essential or front-line worker
Lives alone and only grocery shops
Lives with partner, both of whom only grocery shop
In a closed pod of 4 people(who do not go to work or socialize)
In a closed pod of 10 people(who do not go to work or socialize)
In a closed pod of 20 people(who do not go to work or socialize)
Has 1 close contact(Incl. roommates) who socializes but does not work
Has 4 close contacts(Incl. roommates) who socialize but do not work
Has 10 close contacts(Incl. roommates) who socialize but do not work
Has 1 close contact(Incl. roommates) who is an essential worker

string-array.name: ventilation
string-array.item: A train with air filtration[1/4 the risk]
A moving car with the windows rolled down[1/4 the risk]
A space with one or more sides open the the outdoors[1/4 the risk]

string-array.name: yourMask
string-array.item: No Mask or poorly-worn mask[baseline risk]
Cotton mask, bandanna, or buff[baseline risk]
Surgical mask or mask with PM2.5 filter insert[1/2 the risk]
Well fitting, well sealed N95 respirator[1/10 the risk]

string-array.name: theirMask
string-array.item: No Mask or poorly-worn mask[baseline risk]
Cotton mask, bandanna, or buff[baseline risk]
Surgical mask or mask with PM2.5 filter insert[1/2 the risk]
Well fitting, well sealed N95 respirator[1/10 the risk]

string-array.name: conversation
string-array.item: Not talking(such as quietly riding the train)[1/5 the risk]
Loud talking(shouting, talking over music, singing)[5x the risk]
